articles.author: Wanted in Milan
articles.title: Italy's Samantha Cristoforetti to be first European woman to command International Space Station - Wanted In Milan
articles.description:
Italy's first woman in space makes history again.
Italian astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti will become the first European woman to command the International Space Station (ISS) in 2022.

Cristoforetti, popularly known in Italy as AstroSam, will take charge…
articles.content:
Italian astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti will become the first European woman to command the International Space Station (ISS) in 2022.

articles.author: Frank Jordans and Maria Cheng | AP
articles.title: European regulators OK Pfizer vaccine for children 12-15 - Washington Post
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency has recommended that the use of the coronavirus vaccine made by Pfizer and BioNTech be expanded to children ages 12 to 15
articles.content: The Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine was the first one granted authorization across the European Union in December, when it was given the green light for use in anyone 16 and over. Since then, about 173 milli… [+4698 chars]

articles.title: Haaland drops transfer revelation as Premier League trio continue to circle - Teamtalk.com
articles.description: Erling Haaland has hinted that he may disappoint a number of top European clubs this summer after the sought-after striker said he will be “respectful” to his Borussia Dortmund contract.
